properties.description: Posted by Agent503 937 NW GlisanYear built: 2008. Contemporary sixteen story building located in the heart of the Pearl District, consists of 114 residential condominiums over ground floor retail space and two levels of private parking. The building is slated for LEED gold certification.

properties.name: Avenue Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1400 NW IRVING ST, 97209Year built: 2004 / No. of units: 167 The Avenue Lofts building is located at NW 14th and Irving in the Pearl District. Formerly a Meier & Frank warehouse, it was renovated in 2004 and now contains approx 167 classic loft spaces. Features include wide open spaces, high ceilings, large windows, secured parking and a central courtyard. Units in the building enjoy a historic property tax freeze through year 2015.

properties.name: Benson Tower
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1500 SW 11th, 97201Benson Tower is a 26 story, 250 feet tall, modern glass structure sitting on less than a quarter of a downtown block. The Tower is home to 142 units.The small, 13,000-square-foot lot resulted in small floor plates in a slim tower with very little interior space devoted to common areas. Most floors hold only five or seven condominiums. Unlike most condominiums, the ground floor of the Benson Tower is dedicated to residents\' use, not retail. It features a 130-foot fountain that wraps around three sides of the building. Amenities include a spa & fitness center, a library overlooking sculptured water feature, a private Zen garden & terrace and two high speed elevators.

properties.name: Bridgeport
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1133 NW 11TH AVE, 97209Year built: 2004 / No. of units: 124 Bridgeport is located on NW Marshall between 11th and 12th on the street car line. The east side units overlook Tanner Springs Park. Amenities include secured parking, secured entry, in-unit laundry hookups, and the landscaped courtyard.

properties.name: Chown Pella
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 416 NW 13TH AVE, 97209Chown Pella consists of 68 loft spaces developed in 1996. Originally built in the early 1900\'s, this historical building formerly served as a warehouse and manufacturing site. Amenities include roof-top terrace, secured parking, secured entries, in-unit laundry hookupsl. Units have a tax abatement until 2009.

properties.name: City Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1011 NW GLISAN ST, 97209Turn-of-the-Century warehouse loft featuring exposed brick and timber, secure parking, 14\' ceilings and distinct floor plans.

properties.name: Eliot Tower
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1221 SW 10TH AVE, 97205The 18-story Eliot Tower houses 223 condominiums. Six 2-story town-homes are located on the first and second floors of the building. Most units range in size from 568 to 1,956 square feet. Three floors of penthouse units offer 21 units with seven different unit plans ranging from 1,529 to 2,956 square feet. The entry foyer features 3-story glass windows with a concierge desk and library meeting area at a mezzanine level. Amenities include concierge, gym, meeting room and a common area roof deck on the third floor with barbecue facilities.

properties.name: Flanders Street Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 725 NW FLANDERS ST, 97209The original 4-story building was built in 1921, but a 3-story addition in 1991 facilitated its conversion to 28 condos. Unit amenities include open floor plans, large private patios and exposed timber and beams. The building sits on the North Park Blocks.

properties.name: Hoyt Commons
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 618 N.W. 12th Av, 97209Hoyt Commons is a 4-story condominium building located in the Hoyt Street Yards Community. It has 48 residential units that range in size from about 600 to 1200 feet. Units have 10-foot ceilings and many have terraces. Ground floor retail includes Giorgio’s Restaurant, Zora Jewelers, Za Hair and Gold Leaf Fine Jewelry. Developer : Prendergast

properties.name: Irving Street Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1314 N.W. Irving St, 97209The 8-story building has 84 units some with parking spaces and/or storage units. The building features a rooftop deck with plantings and barbecues available to all residents. Irving Street Lofts was built in 1924 for the Blumauer & Frank Drug Company. In 1937 the building was sold to the McKesson Robbins Drug Company as a warehouse and was converted to rentals and artists lofts in the late 1980s. In 1995, Grancorp, Inc converted the property to loft condominiums.

properties.name: Johnson Street Townhomes
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1199 N.W. Johnson, 97209Built in 1999, the Johnson Street Townhomes features 13 units ranging in size from 1800 to 2700 feet. The building architecture features a flat roof, brick exterior and bold metal windows. Each unit has a private garden at its front door, an attached two car garage, gourmet kitchens, hardwood floors, gas fireplaces, whirlpool tubs, secure entry/parking and a private rooftop patio. Johnson Street Townhomes was named “Project of the Year” in 2000 by Builder Magazine, received the platinum “Best in American Living Award” and was grand prizewinner of the Residential Architect’s Design Awards Competition in the multi-family development category. Developer : Hoyt Street Properties

properties.name: Lexis On The Park
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1102 N.W. 10th Av, 97209The Lexis is a 5-story condominium that was converted from an apartment building. It’s industrial exterior – metal façade with white pre-cast concrete columns clad in perforated aluminum, stainless steel mesh and glass tile – are a tribute to the area’s industrial roots. There is a central courtyard that overlooks Tanner Springs Park. Unit finishes include custom Cherry wood kitchen cabinets, polished stone kitchen and bathroom countertops, and stainless steel appliances. Building amenities include a fitness center and community room. Developer : Hoyt Street Properties

properties.name: Marshall Wells Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1420 N.W. Lovejoy StFormerly an industrial warehouse, the Marshall Wells Lofts offer exposed original woodwork, high ceilings and large windows. The seven story building has 164 loft spaces. Amenities include secured parking, secured entry, in-unit laundry hook-up and a landscaped central courtyard. Units have a tax abatement until 2016

properties.name: McKenzie Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 408 NW 12th Av, 97209The McKenzie Lofts – a 6-story brick, concrete and steel building – was built in 1997-1998. It offers 68 residential units ranging in size from about 650 to 1650 feet. All units have balconies or terraces, air conditioning, indoor parking and storage rooms. Units feature large industrial style windows, oak floors and10 1/2-foot ceilings. There is forced air electric heat on floors 2-5. The 8 penthouses on the 6th floor feature 11 1/2-foot ceilings, gas heat, gas cooking, gas fireplaces, large terraces & some floor-to-ceiling windows.

properties.name: Modern Confectionery Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1240 NW HOYT ST, 97209Originally the home of Portland’s first confectionary production plant in the 1900’s, The Modern Confectionery Lofts were converted to condos in 1999. There are only 7 units in this building. Units feature exposed beams and brick, private decks and a historic tax abatement through 2009. Developer : Robert Ball

properties.name: North Park Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 300 NW 8th Avenue, 97209Originally built in the early 1900’s and used as an indoor junkyard, the North Park Lofts underwent a dramatic conversion in the late 1990’s that added 5 additional floors. Now standing 11 stories, North Park Lofts offers 67 residential units. The lower floors have warehouse elements such as tall ceilings, exposed timber beams and concrete columns. The top five floors were sold as shells and buyers finished them to their own specifications. Each of those units is different. The building has a great rooftop deck common area with its own kitchenette that overlooks the North Park Blocks

properties.name: Old Town Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 411 NW FLANDERS PORTLAND ORNewer loft spaces with concrete floors, wood windows and modern finishes. A classic brick exterior building, located just steps from downtown.

properties.name: Park Northwest Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 327 N.W. Park Street, 97209Built in 2000, Park Northwest Lofts offers 18 lofts, most of which face the North Park Blocks. Ground floor retail includes PeemKaew Thai, who offers residents a 10% discount.

properties.name: Park Place
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 922 N.W. 11th Av, 97209Park Place consists of a 13-story main tower with 91 traditional condos, 25 lofts and eight penthouses. An adjacent 3-story building includes 7 town homes, 4 of which are live/work style lofts. Unit sizes range from 735 to 2715 sqft and there are over 36 floor plans which creates a lot of variety. Amenities include full time concierge service, secured parking, custom kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, stainless appliances, and in-unit laundry hook-ups. Many units have terraces.

properties.name: Pearl Block Townhomes
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 636 N.W. 11th Av, 97209The classy townhouses front onto both sides of the 600 block of NW 11th Avenue. All homes have decks facing the street, offering a distinct landscaping. Very few of these become available on the open market.

properties.name: Pearl Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1009 N.W. Hoyt St, 97209The Pearl Lofts was built in 1994 and boasts 27 units with large windows, 15’ ceilings, wood floors and secure entry and parking. Developer : Carroll Aspen

properties.name: Riverstone
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 821 N.W. 11th Av, 97209Built in 1998, this six story building features a central courtyard, secured underground parking, in-unit laundry hook-ups and outside terraces. There are 123 units at Riverstone. Most range from 610 - 1395 sqft with several larger penthouses located on the top floor. Ground floor retail includes Piazza Italia, L’Mu Salon, Swiss Cleaners, Pearl Market and Wells Fargo.

properties.name: Streetcar Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1030 N.W. 12th Av, 97209Built in 2001, it has 139 loft spaces in a variety of floor plans, both single-level and two-level.Amenities include 10-foot ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, French doors that open onto European-style balconies, secured parking, a fitness room, a community room and a private central courtyard. Ground floor retail includes Sungari Pearl, Umpqua Bank, Teko, Out of Gray Luxury Gifts, Plum Tree Mortgage, Scardina Design Studio and Souri’s Gifts and Home Furnishings. Streetcar Lofts is part of the Hoyt Street Yards Community.

properties.name: Tanner Place
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1030 N.W. Johnson St, 97209Tanner Place – a 6-story brick building – was completed in October 2000. Each of the 120 residential units includes a gas fireplace, balcony and underground parking. The building overlooks Jamison Square Park and is right on the streetcar line. Ground floor retail includes Visage Eyewear, Nirvana Day Spa, Sinju Japanese Restaurant, Pearl Audio Video, Posh Boutique, Shoefly and Le Train Bleu.

properties.name: The Casey
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 311 NW 12th, 97209

properties.name: The Civic
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1926 W BURNSIDE, 97209The Civic is a sixteen story condo tower situated next to PGE park (stadium) and the MAX station. It features approx 261 units configured as 196 one bedroom lofts, 56 two bedroom homes and 9 penthouses. This is a highly energy efficient building that is LEED certified Gold. The Civic features a public plaza, a unique lobby, concierge service, secured entry and underground parking. Developer: Gerding-Edlen Development

properties.name: The Edge Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1410 NW Kearny St, Portland, ORYear buitl: 2004 / No. of units: 123

properties.name: The Elizabeth
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 333 NW 9th, 97209The Elizabeth is a 16-story building that includes a spectacular outdoor plaza. The 182 units are thoughtfully designed contemporary spaces ranging in size from 725 to 3,500 feet. Unit finishes include 9’8” ceilings, gourmet appliances, granite countertops, hardwood floors and dedicated parking.

properties.name: The Gregory Lofts
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 420 NW 11th Avenue, 97209The Gregory Lofts Condominiums, built by Carroll Aspen development group, were first occupied in 2000. Office spaces and ground floor retail spaces complement the residential lofts. The Gregory\'s 133 residential units range in size from about 1000 to 3000 square feet. Roof-top terrace.

properties.name: The Henry
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1025 NW Couch Portland, OR 97209The Henry – a 15-story luxury high rise – was completed in 2004. It is adjacent to the historic Portland Armory, home of the Gerding Theater in the popular Brewery Blocks area of the Pearl District. The 123 units range in size from 755 to 2,945 feet. Amenities include floorplans with defined rooms and graduated ceiling heights; sophisticated entry and lobby; state of the art security; concierge service; and the popular Brewery Blocks location.

properties.name: The Metropolitan
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1001 NW Lovejoy St, 97209At 225 feet, The Metropolitan is currently the tallest building in the Pearl District. The building is comprised of a 19-story tower and a 4-story live/work building. The tower is home to 121 large and luxurious residential units and the live/work building is home to 12 loft-style homes. The tower and live/work building sit over 20,000 feet in ground level retail space and two floors of underground parking. See website for amenities and floor-plans.

properties.name: The Pinnacle
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1255 N.W. 9th Av, 97209The Pinnacle consists of an L-shaped, 14-story high-rise wing, connected with a seven-story low-rise wing. The structure wraps around a one-story retail pavilion and courtyard. The 176 Units range in size from 600 to 2,500 square feet. Unit Finishes include cacao wood flooring imported from Indonesia, maple cabinets, and pre-stained birch doors and hemlock base. Building amenities include two levels of secure underground parking, dramatic two-story lobby and secure entry. Developer : Hoyt Street Properties

properties.name: Waterfront Pearl
properties.description: Posted by Agent503 1200 NW Naito PKWY, 97209The Waterfront Pearl offers dockside living on Portland’s Willamette River. The project consists of two 10-story towers -- Mistral, the north tower and Azure, the south tower. Both towers have dramatic river, mountain and pearl district views. Units feature hardwood floors, high-quality wool carpeting in bedrooms, natural gas fireplaces, European kitchens with quartz countertops and designer lighting. Building amenities include 24-hour concierge service, extensive landscaping, guest suite in each building, steam room and fitness center with high quality cardio and resistance training equipment, conference room and bike storage.
